name: dooms-quickbar-item-cycler
title: Dooms Quickbar Item Cycler
author: me
description: Select items on the quickbar multiple times to get different items, e.g. yellow belt -> red belt -> blue belt. Also, for space exploration mod, automatically swap out the quick bar when entering/leaving space (can be disabled in settings). Credit for original mod goes to: https://mods.factorio.com/user/letmedownloadmods.
